## Description {#details}

Base class for the extensible RTTI hierarchy.

This class defines virtual methods, dynamicClassID and isA, that enable type comparisons.

Definition at line 69 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/extensiblertti-h">ExtensibleRTTI.h</a>.
